page.title: 12EDUCATION. VILLAGE SCHOOL
page.content: Our school has 21 children and two teachers.We start at 9.00am and have a break at 10.30 till 10.45.At 11.55 we walk to the Institute for our dinner. After dinner we walk back to school. We start again at 1.15 and at 2.30 we have another break till 2.45.At 3.30 we go home.The Institute is our village hall,we go there because we have no canteen in school (it is about 1/2km.) We have 2 classes and 2 teachers.Mr.Dakin (the headmaster) teaches the juniors,Miss Hurst teaches the infants.We have two dinner ladies who are called Mrs. Cooper and Mrs. Littlewood.They look after us at dinner time.We have a secretary called Mrs.Lomas,who works 1/2 time.Mrs. Smith and Mrs.Marsden serve our dinners and wash up afterwards.They don't cook the dinners.
